document_data.name: Six Windows
document_data.mainbody: '''Six Windows''' was a boarding house located in the town of [[Triboar]], within the [[Dessarin Valley]].
document_data.Structure: Despite its name, the inn seemed to have dozens upon dozens of windows.
document_data.Interior: The building was pretty rundown and drafty.
document_data.Services: Six Windows offered rooms for rent to those individuals who could not find a spot at the [[Everwyvern House|Everwyvern]] or [[Northshield House]].
document_data.History:
As of the {{YearlinkName|1365}}, Six Windows was managed by [[Jaunda]], who sold the items, clothes, and equipment that had been left within the inn over the years.

Around the {{YearlinkName|1485}}, it was run by the senile old widow, [[Tolmara Hysstryn]]. She had a propensity for spying upon her guests through keyholes in the doors.
